course_title: Diagnostics and Clinical Reasoning: Pediatric Clinical Specialty
class_notes: This section is for PNP-PC and PNP-AC students only. Online  with some synchronous sessions. Intensives October 5-6, November 30-December 1.
course_description: This course is designed to develop assessment and clinical reasoning skills along with application and analysis of evidenced-based theory to deliver care to the patients across the pediatric lifespan, promoting optimal health.
prerequisites: NRSG 544D or equivalent transfer credit as co-requisite. Students must enroll in NRSG 544D first.
sections: Class Nbr: 6472, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: W 10a-12:50p, Instructor: J. Rodriguez, Status: Open
